alert.note: Alert for Milwaukee; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 5:28PM CDT until August 24 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Milwaukee County in southeastern Wisconsin... Northeastern Racine County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wind Point, or near Racine, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Racine, Oak Creek, Franklin, Wind Point, Caledonia, North Bay, and Franksville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
